name: Easy Darts 3D Pro
description:
Easy Darts 3D Pro is an exceptionally engrossing yet simple Dart Game. The App has an engaged gameplay with the feel of beautiful 3D graphics.
Install this application and experience all new 3D Darting. Just follow below given steps to play

> Enter your name as game-player
> Go through the instructions for individual levels and select a level
> Aim the dart towards the target with just a tap on screen
> Throw the darts with varying speeds again with just a tap on screen.
> Proceed to further levels with experience

So, Aim your dart, hit your target and earn points.
Enjoy Darting. Best of Luck :)
